name: Topiramate

dosing.notes: Start very low and titrate slowly to minimize cognitive side effects. Take twice daily. Adequate hydration essential (kidney stone risk). Contraception required in women of childbearing age.

canadian_clinical.titration_schedule: Increase by 25 mg every 1-2 weeks. Target dose 50-100 mg BID.
canadian_clinical.inpatient_strategy: For acute bipolar adjunct: start 25 mg BID, titrate to 100-200 mg/day. Monitor cognitive function.
canadian_clinical.outpatient_strategy: Titrate slowly (25 mg/1-2 weeks). For migraine prevention: target 50-100 mg/day. For bipolar: 100-200 mg/day.

cautions.renal: Reduce dose by 50% if CrCl <70. Monitor for kidney stones.
cautions.hepatic: Use with caution; plasma levels may be increased.
cautions.pregnancy: Contraindicated — major teratogen (oral clefts, neural tube defects). Requires effective contraception.

warnings: Cognitive impairment ('dopamax') — word-finding difficulty, slowed thinking, memory issues
